entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
